name: Rabbit Burn
summary: Fabulous riches, flying fists, and sensual embraces abound in this dazzling arena where rabbit-masked men and scantily clad bunny girls sprint to and fro, dodging explosions, brawling with enemies, making love, or just dancing to the music.　This is the crazy and depraved billiards-based game, Rabbit Burn!
info:
• 游戏制作: CPUX4
  • 日文名: ラビット バーン
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ERO / SIM
  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2018-07-08
  • 官方网站: https://erogejapan.com/pk/sheet.php?p=Rabbit_Burn
